title: Instablocked From Calling Lane
body:
So I only play norms now because I did what every new player does, jump into ranked straight away. So i only play norms for a bit until i get good enough to climb ranks. 
Anyway, whenever i join a game I try to call my lane and I get blocked from chat??

replies.body:
Hey Phayase,

This isn't normal behavior within the client. Can you try [**repairing your client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article) and see if that resolves the problem?
